DOC.brief_summary: The increase diabetic population world among top ten cause death ; diabetes always high list cause death . Diabetes always relative major cause death , ( e.g . cerebral vascular disease , cardiovascular disease renal disease ) . The eat habit pattern diabetic patient main cause poor glycemic control . In epidemiological study , high fiber low sugar dietary intake significantly reduce incidence diabetes . The purpose study investigate effect high fiber sugar-free biscuit regulate blood glucose pre-diabetic subject . The study conduct three period : Period-I : The recruitment 60 pre-diabetic subject : Subjects blood glucose level `` Impaired fasting glucose ; IFG '' : fasting blood glucose ≧ 100 mg / dL , < 126 mg / dL `` Impaired glucose tolerance ; IGT '' : 2 hour postprandial blood glucose ≧ 140mg/dL , < 200 mg/dL clinically judge mild moderate diabetes mellitus ( HbA1c < 9 % ) . In addition perform pre-test , subject also need complete nutrition counsel nutrition education . All 60 subject randomly select two group , Group-1,30 subject , ( Placebo group , normal fiber normal sugar biscuit group ) , Group-2 , 30 subject , ( Experimental group , high fiber sugar free biscuit group ) The period-II : Duration : 8 week Group-1,30 subject , ( Placebo group , normal fiber normal sugar biscuit group ) , All 30 subject consume 3 serving Low-fiber , normal sugar biscuit daily . Group-2 , 30 subject , ( Experimental group , high fiber sugar free biscuit group ) All 30 subject consume 3 serve high-fiber , sugar free biscuit ( contain 16 gram fiber ) daily . Post-period : Blood sample 60 subject collect compare period-I period-II first day 9th week . Report expectation : The purpose study help pre-diabetic subject reduce risk become diabetic consuming high fiber sugar free biscuit nutrition education .
DOC.brief_title: Effect High Fiber Sugar Free Biscuits Prediabetics Population
DOC.detailed_description: The increase diabetic population world , among top ten cause death ; diabetes always top cause death . Diabetes always relate major cause death , ( e.g . cerebral vascular disease , cardiovascular disease renal disease ) . The eat habit pattern diabetic patient main cause poor glycemic control . In epidemiological study , high fiber rand low sugar dietary intake significantly reduce incidence diabetes . The purpose study investigate effect high fiber sugar-free biscuit regulate blood glucose pre-diabetic subject . The study conduct three period : Period-I : The recruitment 60 pre-diabetic subject : Subjects blood glucose level `` Impaired fasting glucose ; IFG '' : fasting blood glucose ≧ 100 mg / dL , < 126 mg/dL `` Impaired glucose tolerance ; IGT '' : 2 hour postprandial blood glucose ≧ 140mg/dL , < 200 mg/dL clinically judge mild moderate diabetes mellitus ( HbA1c < 9 % ) . In addition perform pre-test , subject also need complete nutrition counsel nutrition education . All 60 subject randomly select two group , Group-1,30 subject , ( Placebo group , normal fiber normal sugar biscuit group ) , Group-2 , 30 subject , ( Experimental group , high fiber sugar free biscuit group ) Blood sample collect 60 subject investigate : HbA1c , Blood sugar ( Fasting 2 hour meal ) , Insulin , Fructosamine , SGOT , SGPT , ALK-P , TOTAL PROTEIN , Albumin , Globulin , Ketone , Bun , Creatinine , Cholesterol , TG , LDl , HDL , WBC , RBC , Hgb , Hct , M.C.V. , MCH , MCHC , Platelet . The period-II : Duration : 8 week Group-1,30 subject , ( Placebo group , normal fiber normal sugar biscuit group ) , All 30 subject consume 3 serve Low-fiber , normal sugar biscuit daily . Group-2 , 30 subject , ( Experimental group , high fiber sugar free biscuit group ) All 30 subject consume 3 serve high-fiber , sugar free biscuit ( contain 16 gram fiber ) daily . Post-period : Blood sample 60 subject collect compare period-I period-II first day 9th week . Report expectation : The purpose study help pre-diabetic subject reduce risk become diabetic consuming high fiber sugar free biscuit nutrition education .
